actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to amend Senate Resolution 66, relating to committee funding, to clarify the spending authority of the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

summary.text: Amends S. Res. 66 (Omnibus Committee Funding Resolution for 1989 and 1990) with respect to the spending authority of the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

titles.title: A resolution to amend Senate Resolution 66, relating to committee funding, to clarify the spending authority of the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
